text_logic_form: The measure of angle $DPC$ is $3x - 15$ degrees.

diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $D$ and $B$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $C$ and $A$.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $BC$, $CD$, and $DA$, forming the rhombus $ABCD$.
There are lines $DB$ and $AC$, forming the diagonals of the rhombus.
There are lines $AP$, $BP$, $CP$, and $DP$, connecting each vertex of the rhombus to point $P$.
